name: pinging
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
ping
[ I ] to make a short, sharp sound: We heard a small stone ping against our window.
[ T ] informal to send an email, text, or other kind of message, especially to someone's mobile phone: Ping me an email. It is a legal requirement to self-isolate after being pinged by the COVID-19 app.
[ T ]
  computing
  specialized to send a message to another computer in a network to check whether your computer is connected to it
[ I ] US (UK pink) When a car engine pings, it makes a high knocking sound because the fuel is not burning correctly.
